CustomField.description: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter on a single timecard day. If the total number of hours for a resource exceeds this amount on a single timecard day, an error message is displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter on a single timecard day. If the total number of hours for a resource exceeds this amount on a single timecard day, an error message is displayed.
CustomField.label: Max Resource Hours Per Day
